channel.title: NPC's dialogues
channel.description:
Hello can someone help me to change npc dialogues? I'm using rune-evo v3 and cant find those files...
EDIT: Well I find like NPC file I removed one line from shop, it compiled no errors but still it shows that line. Can someone help me ? :/

item.title: NPC's dialogues
item.dc:creator: @GolDeNN GolDeNN
item.description:
@GolDeNN wrote:

[quote=“Ikthat, post:2, topic:547639”]Idk if this is PI as you didn’t say and idk what revision rune-evo is so…
here is PI

Go to DiaglogueHandler.java
And just CTRL + F the dialogue the npc you wish to change has example:
"scoreboard"
And you’ll find this

case 1337: sendOption2("PK'er Scoreboard", "Skiller Scoreboard"); c.dialogueAction = 1337; break;

Now just change:

Note: it could be a different number after sendOption.

If this isn’t what you asked for, please be more specific.[/quote]

It’s very shorth script nothing there, well i found files with shop dialogues but it just dont change, why?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Ikthat Ikthat
item.description:
@Ikthat wrote:

Idk if this is PI as you didn’t say and idk what revision rune-evo is so…
here is PI

Go to DiaglogueHandler.java
And just CTRL + F the dialogue the npc you wish to change has example:
"scoreboard"
And you’ll find this

case 1337: sendOption2("PK'er Scoreboard", "Skiller Scoreboard"); c.dialogueAction = 1337; break;

Now just change:

Note: it could be a different number after sendOption.

If this isn’t what you asked for, please be more specific.

Read full topic
